name: Strawberry Beet Semolina Oats Laddoo (Indian Sweet, Vegan)
description: Strawberry Beet Semolina oats Laddoo (Indian Sweet). These fun little sweets are easy to adapt with different spices and fruits. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: half an inch cube of of beet (1 tablespoon chopped beet)

recipeInstructions.text: Blend and puree the Strawberries and beet with sugar and a teaspoon or 2 of water till nicely pureed.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend and puree the Strawberries and beet with sugar and a teaspoon or 2 of water till nicely pureed.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the oats and blend again to get a thick paste.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the oats and blend again to get a thick paste.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add the butter and heat on medium low heat till it melts.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, add the butter and heat on medium low heat till it melts.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the cashews and raisins and cook for 2 minutes till cashews start to turn golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the cashews and raisins and cook for 2 minutes till cashews start to turn golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the semolina in the pan and roast for 3-4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the semolina in the pan and roast for 3-4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the cardamom powder and strawberry beet and oats puree and mix well stirring continuously.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the cardamom powder and strawberry beet and oats puree and mix well stirring continuously.

recipeInstructions.text: If the mixture doesnt come together, then add a little water or almond milk.
recipeInstructions.name: If the mixture doesnt come together, then add a little water or almond milk.

recipeInstructions.text: Take off the heat after a minute and let it sit and cool for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Take off the heat after a minute and let it sit and cool for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Shape the mixture into small spheres and serve! I got about 8 small inch rounds!
recipeInstructions.name: Shape the mixture into small spheres and serve! I got about 8 small inch rounds!

recipeInstructions.text: Store in airtight container in the refrigerator for a few days.
recipeInstructions.name: Store in airtight container in the refrigerator for a few days.

keywords: quick recipe, traditional indian sweet, vegan sweets
